title: Professional Scrum Master I (PSM I)
description: Certified understanding of Scrum framework principles, accountabilities, events, and artifacts to support effective Agile delivery.

title: GitHub Foundations (GH-900)
description: Demonstrated foundational understanding of GitHub, including repositories, collaboration workflows, and GitHub platform capabilities.

title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900)
description: Validated foundational knowledge of cloud concepts and Microsoft Azure services, workloads, security, and governance.

title: GitHub Actions (GH-200)
description: Validated practical CI/CD automation skills using GitHub Actions workflows, runners, and deployment pipelines.
